page.title: 10SCHOOL & THE TERCENTENARY
page.content: The schools of the{King's Sedgemoor} combined to mark the occasion of the 300th anniversary of the Last Battle on English soil:{THE BATTLE OF} {SEDGEMOOR.}Othery, Middlezoy. Westonzoyland Primary Schools, Chedzoy Junior School and Bawdrip First School worked together. The older children camped out near the battlefield and at midnight made a silent march in the dark,just like the Duke of Monmouth's men,to the battlefield to see if there really were ghosts on the field.No sighting s were reported!This was followed next day by all of the children young & old & parents in costume having a day of dancing ,pageant and battle re-enactment.The day was rounded off by presentation of special Somerset Cider Mugs by the P.T.A.'s to everyone
